title: I-140 | Immigrant Petition for Alien Workers
description: Use this form to petition for an alien worker to become a permanent resident in the United States.

filings.category: Additional Fees:Asylum Program FeeIf you are filing as a Regular Petitioner;If filing as a Nonprofit; orIf filing as a Small Employer or self-petitionerIf paying by check or money order, submit the fee separately.
